iops.description: For PIOPS volumes, the IOPS per disk.

mountPoint.description: The path to mount the EBS volume on the layer's instances.

numberOfDisks.description: The number of disks to use for the EBS volume.

raidLevel.description: The RAID level to use for the volume.

size.description: The size of the volume in gigabytes.

type.description: The type of volume to create. This may be `standard` (the default), `io1` or `gp2`.
